Html:
Hi all,

I didn't have a closer look at PRISM 4 yet but I would be interested if it will support Unity. From what I've seen so far is that you are applying MEF for DI. However, we need some features (e.g. child containers) which are not available in MEF and therefore require Unity.

I hope it will be compatible with Unity 2!

Cheers,

Christoph
If you will took a look at the documentation in any of the Prism 4 drops you will see that it supports both a UnityBootstrapper and MefBootstrapper.
